item.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.

item.title: 'I don't know': Trump says of Netanyahu denying Gaza starvation crisis
item.description: The Hamas-run Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip said in a Monday statement that another 14 people died of malnutrition over the previous 24 hours.

item.title: Heat indices could hit 120 as sweltering temperatures grip eastern US
item.description: More than 185 million people across most of the United States are on alert for widespread, dangerous heat on Monday.

item.title: How new technology could help pilots improve flight safety
item.description: Pilot spatial disorientation causes 5-10% of all general aviation accidents, the FAA says, and new technology could improve safety.

item.title: Couple killed in Arkansas state park while hiking with 2 daughters, officials say
item.description: A 43-year-old man and a 41-year-old woman were killed at Devil's Den State Park in Arkansas, the state police said.
